info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 3:28PM PDT until August 20 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM PDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 320 PM PDT, wind gusts near 50 mph were recorded in Surprise Valley north of Joshua Tree. Wind gusts to 60 mph remain possible. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Twentynine Palms, Twentynine Palms Base, Joshua Tree Lake Campground and Joshua Tree. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Las Vegas.
